WorkItem.Description:
It appears that Rawr does not yet recognize a new currency type, i.e., the Venture Coin.  These things are rewards from a number of PvP dailies going on around or near the logging camps.
http://www.wowhead.com/?item=37836#currency-for
Â 
Items, such as the Venture Bay Buccaneer's Cape simply show "Purchaseable with 50 [Unknown]" when you update them (Armory or WoWHead).
